full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: EFA66-220999 Boiler Checks and Maintenance
## Contract Information

### Tender Reference Number
WS3775131441

### Tender Title
Boiler Checks and Maintenance

### Tender Status
Expired

### Original Closing Date
2023-02-03T14:00:00

### Expected Contract End Date
2028-03-31

### Tender Category
SRV (Services)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (AFTA)

### Region of Opportunity
Montréal

### Regions of Delivery
Montréal

### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information
Marie-Claude Dugal (SPAC/PSPC)
marie-claude.dugal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Details

This tender notice is for the acquisition of boiler checks and maintenance located in 715 Peel, Montréal, Québec, Canada. The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) of Canada.

The procurement method is competitive-open bidding, with a selection criterion of lowest price. The expected contract end date is 2028-03-31.

## Tender Requirements

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EST on 2023-02-03. Any bids received after 14:00 HNE on the same day will be considered non-responsive.

## Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14798810?extsite=MTQ3OTg4MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This rewritten announcement includes all the essential details while using proper punctuation and formatting. I also included a title to the rewritten entry to make it easy for readers to identify. Additionally, I reformatted the sections to use headings for easy reading. Please let me know if you'd like me to make any further changes. 

Also, I fixed a small error in the notice URL, the data was a little bit misplaced in the data you provided, I corrected it for consistency. 

Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance! 

**Note**: In case you would like a 「 years of experience」 state, I can add the fixed format according to your needs. 

Also, the above written format is going to make it more beautiful and better to read.
